createCallback(uint256,uint256,bytes).code: function createCallback(uint256 delRisky, uint256 delStable, bytes data) external nonpayable

delRisky.description: Amount of risky tokens required to initialize risky reserve

delStable.description: Amount of stable tokens required to initialize stable reserve

data.description: Calldata passed on create function call

createCallback(uint256,uint256,bytes).notice: Triggered when creating a new pool for an Engine
